title: The start page still works when the API is not available
description:
* when the API is temporarily not available, the start page should work and look like exactly as before
* the node type sections may show a fallback number for the node count or use a cached one (if available)
* the links in the sections still need to work → the linked overview pages might show cached data or an empty page → this is **not** in the scope of this ticket
